BBEX3.A.TMM.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Turkmenistan / USD 1 = TMM ... (middle)

General: The manat has been pegged to the US dollar since April 1998. Currency conversion with effect from 1 January 2009 at the rate of TMM 5,000 = TMT 1; for exchange rates as of 2009, see BBEX2:A:TMM:USD:CA:AC:A04.
Source: Central Bank of Turkmenistan, Ashgabat.
Methodology: Until 1998, calculated on the basis of month-end rates; thereafter, pegged to the US dollar.

Comment on 2008: On 1 January 2008, the fixed exchange rate with the US dollar was changed from USD 1 = TMM 5,200 to USD 1 = TMM 6,250; calculated devaluation: 16.8%.  On 1 May 2008, the fixed exchange rate with the US dollar was changed from USD 1 = TMM 6,250 to USD 1 = TMM 14,250; calculated devaluation: 56,1%. Annual average calculated on the basis of daily exchange rates.  Currency conversion with effect from 1 January 2009 at the rate of TMM 5,000 = TMT 1.
